events.title: John Wilmot, the Second Earl of Rochester, dies

movie.title: The Libertine
movie.plot: The story of John Wilmot, a.k.a. the Earl of Rochester, a 17th century poet who famously drank and debauched his way to an early grave, only to earn posthumous critical acclaim for his life's work.

movie.title: Guadalcanal Diary
movie.plot: Concentrating on the personal lives of those involved, a war correspondent takes us through the preparations, landing and initial campaign on Guadalcanal during WWII.

movie.title: Detroit
movie.plot: A police raid in Detroit in 1967 results in one of the largest citizens' uprisings in the history of the United States.

events.title: "Thomas Marcano... was shot at close range five times"

movie.title: Sleepers
movie.plot: Two gangsters seek revenge on the state jail worker who during their stay at a youth prison sexually abused them. A sensational court hearing takes place to charge him for the crimes.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.
